title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A shepherd's journey in search of treasure becomes a path of personal transformation.

author: George Orwell
description: A chilling depiction of totalitarianism and the erosion of truth and freedom.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A timeless tale of love, class, and societal expectations in Georgian England.

title: It Ends With Us
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A heart-wrenching story of love, resilience, and difficult choices.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A woman’s shocking act of violence and a therapist’s obsession to uncover the truth.
